data.name: WIC Conquest of Curaçao
data.desc: WIC send Joannes van Walbeeck and Pierre le Grand to establish settlement at Curaçao
data.locn: Netherlands, Barbados, St. Vincent, Bonaire, Curaçao
data.agents_sp: Gov Lope López de Morla, Juan Mateo 32 Sp 500 Am natives
data.agents_nsp0: Joannes van Walbeeck, Pierre le Grand, Jan Janszoon Otzen, Diego de los Reyes 6 Ships 400 men
data.prim_n: WIC 1.05.01.01, 2 [6 Apr 1634] / Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 4 301-311 / Wright D 1 pp *183-*247
data.note: 6 Ships = Groot Hoorn, Eenhoorn, Brack, Engel Gabriel, and 2 Biscayan sloops /v Goslinga 265
